verses.plain: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.

tokens.t: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.

verses.plain: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

tokens.t: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

verses.plain: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,

tokens.t: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,

verses.plain: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;

tokens.t: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;

verses.plain: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.

tokens.t: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.

verses.plain: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,

tokens.t: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,

verses.plain: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

tokens.t: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

verses.plain: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.

tokens.t: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.

verses.plain: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.

tokens.t: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all
, as theirs also was.

verses.plain: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,

tokens.t: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,

verses.plain: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.

tokens.t: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of
all the Lord delivered me.

verses.plain: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

tokens.t: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

verses.plain: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.

tokens.t: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.

verses.plain: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;

tokens.t: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned

verses.plain: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.

tokens.t: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.

verses.plain: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:

tokens.t: All scripture
given by inspiration of God, and
profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:

verses.plain: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.

tokens.t: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
